anya-e0201n3:562_5: upahaccaparinibbāyī pu. pa. 37, aveccappasādo, chakkhattuparamaṁ, sattakkhattuparamo pu. pa. 31 iccādi.
anya-e0201n3:568: Dve vidhā pakārā yassāti duvidho, dve paṭṭāni yassāti dupaṭṭaṁ, cīvaraṁ, duvaṅgikaṁ, jhānaṁ iccādi.
anya-e0201n3:571: Dve guṇā paṭalā yassāti diguṇā, saṅghāṭi, dve gāvo digu, dve rattiyo dirattaṁ, dvirattaṁ vā.
anya-e0201n3:574: Dve vā tayo vā vārā dvattikkhattuṁ, dve vā tayo vā pattā dvattipattā.
anya-e0201n3:576: Aññapadatthavajjite samāse satādito aññasmiṁ saṅkhyāpade pare dvissa ā hoti.
anya-e0201n3:577: Dve ca dasa ca dvādasa, dvīhi vā adhikā dasa dvādasa, dvāvīsati, dvattiṁsa, rassattaṁ.
anya-e0201n3:579: Anaññattheti kiṁ? Dve dasa yasminti dvidasa.
anya-e0201n3:581: Anaññatthe asatādo saṅkhyāpade pare tissa e hoti.
anya-e0201n3:582: Tayo ca dasa ca terasa, tīhi vā adhikā dasa terasa. Evaṁ tevīsati, tettiṁsa.
anya-e0201n3:584: Cattālīsādīsu paresu tissa e hoti vā.
anya-e0201n3:585: Tecattālīsaṁ, ticattālīsaṁ, tepaññāsaṁ, tipaññāsaṁ, tesaṭṭhi, tisaṭṭhi, tesattati, tisattati, teasīti, tiasīti, tenavuti, tinavuti.
anya-e0201n3:587: Cattālīsādo dvissa e hoti vā ā ca.
anya-e0201n3:588_0: Dvecattālīsaṁ, dvācattālīsaṁ, dvicattālīsaṁ, dvepaññāsaṁ, dvipaññāsaṁ, dvāsaṭṭhi,
anya-e0201n3:588_1: dvesaṭṭhi, dvāsattati, dvesattati, dvāsīti, dvānavuti, dvenavuti. Vāsaddena paññāsamhi
anya-e0201n3:590: Acattālīsādo pare dvissa bā hoti vā.
anya-e0201n3:591: Bārasa, dvādasa, bāvīsati, dvāvīsati, bāttiṁsa, dvattiṁsa.
anya-e0201n3:594: Dase pare catussa cu, co honti vā.
anya-e0201n3:597: Esu pañcassa paṇṇa, pannā honti vā yathākkamaṁ.
anya-e0201n3:603: Dase pare eka, aṭṭhānaṁ ā hoti.
anya-e0201n3:606: Ekādisaṅkhyamhā parassa dasassa ra hoti vā.
anya-e0201n3:607: Ekārasa, ekādasa, bārasa, dvādasa, pannarasa, pañcadasa, sattarasa, sattadasa, aṭṭhārasa, aṭṭhādasa, bādese pannādese ca niccaṁ. Idha na hoti, catuddasa.
anya-e0201n3:609: Cha, tīhi parassa dassa ḷo hoti ro ca.
anya-e0201n3:612: ‘Aḍḍhuḍḍhatiyā’ti aḍḍhā+uḍḍhatiyāti chedo, aḍḍhamhā paresaṁ catuttha, tatiyānaṁ uḍḍha, tiyā honti yathākkamaṁ.
anya-e0201n3:613: Aḍḍhena catuttho aḍḍhuḍḍho, aḍḍhena tatiyo aḍḍhatiyo.
anya-e0201n3:616: Aḍḍhamhā parassa dutiyassa saha aḍḍhena diyaḍḍha, divaḍḍhā honti.
anya-e0201n3:618_0: Yathā ca eka, dvi,ti, catu, pañca, cha, satta, aṭṭha, nava, dasasaddā paccekaṁ attano
anya-e0201n3:618_1: atthesu nipatanti, tathā vīsati, tiṁsati, cattālīsa, paññāsa, saṭṭhi, sattati, asīti,
anya-e0201n3:618_2: navutisaddā paccekaṁ attano atthesu nipatanti, dasasaddassa kāriyā na honti, evaṁ
anya-e0201n3:619_0: Tato paraṁ pana dasa sahassāni dasasahassaṁ, idaṁ ‘nahuta’nti ca vuccati, sataṁ sahassāni
anya-e0201n3:619_1: satasahassaṁ, idaṁ ‘lakkha’nti ca vuccati, dasa satasahassāni dasasatasahassanti
anya-e0201n3:620: Dve satāni dvisataṁ, tīṇi satāni tisataṁ, dve sahassāni dvisahassaṁ, tīṇi sahassāni tisahassaṁ iccādīni digumhi vuttāneva.
anya-e0201n3:621_0: Gaṇanapathe pana ekaṭṭhānaṁ, dasaṭṭhānaṁ, sataṭṭhānaṁ, sahassaṭṭhānaṁ, dasasahassaṭṭhānaṁ,
anya-e0201n3:621_1: satasahassaṭṭhānaṁ, dasasatasahassaṭṭhānanti imāni satta ṭhānāni kamena dasaguṇitāni
anya-e0201n3:621_2: honti. Tattha ekaṭṭhānaṁ nāma ekaṁ, dve, tīṇi iccādi. Dasaṭṭhānaṁ nāma dasa, vīsaṁ,
anya-e0201n3:621_3: tiṁsaṁ iccādi. Sataṭṭhānaṁ nāma sataṁ, dvisataṁ, tisataṁ iccādi. Sahassaṭṭhānaṁ nāma
anya-e0201n3:621_4: sahassaṁ, dvisahassaṁ, tisahassaṁ iccādi. Evaṁ uparipi. Ekamekasmiñca ṭhāne nava
anya-e0201n3:621_5: padāni ca nava antaranavantāni ca honti. Ayaṁ mūlabhūmi nāma.
anya-e0201n3:622_0: Taduttari koṭibhūmi nāma. Tatthapi ekaṭṭhānaṁ, dasaṭṭhānaṁ, sataṭṭhānaṁiccādīni satta
anya-e0201n3:622_1: ṭhānāni honti. Tattha mūlabhūmiyā antimaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā dasaguṇite kate koṭibhūmiyaṁ
anya-e0201n3:622_2: ekaṭṭhānaṁ hoti, idhapi satta ṭhānāni kamena dasaguṇitāniyeva, idha dasakoṭisatasahassaṁ
anya-e0201n3:623_0: Taduttari pakoṭibhūmi nāma. Etthapi satta ṭhānāni honti. Tattha koṭibhūmiyā antimaṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0201n3:623_1: gahetvā dasaguṇite kate pakoṭibhūmiyaṁ ekaṭṭhānaṁ hoti, idhapi satta ṭhānāni dasaguṇitāniyeva,
anya-e0201n3:623_2: dasapakoṭisatasahassaṁ antimaṭṭhānaṁ, iminā nayena sabbabhūmīsu uparūpari bhūmisaṅkanti
anya-e0201n3:624_0: Ayaṁ panettha bhūmikkamo-mūlabhūmi, koṭibhūmi, pakoṭibhūmi, koṭipakoṭibhūmi, nahutabhūmi,
anya-e0201n3:624_1: ninnahutabhūmi, akkhobhiṇībhūmi bhinī, bhanītipi dissanti, bindubhūmi, abbudabhūmi,
anya-e0201n3:624_2: nirabbudabhūmi, ahahabhūmi, abababhūmi, aṭaṭabhūmi, sogandhikabhūmi, uppalabhūmi,
anya-e0201n3:624_3: kumudabhūmi, puṇḍarīkabhūmi, padumabhūmi, kathānabhūmi, mahākathānabhūmi, asaṅkhyeyyabhūmīti
anya-e0201n3:624_4: ekavīsati bhūmiyo sattacattālīsasataṁ ṭhānāni ca honti.
anya-e0201n3:625_0: Nirayabhūmīnaṁ kamena pana abbudabhūmi, nirabbudabhūmi, abababhūmi, aṭaṭabhūmi, ahahabhūmi,
anya-e0201n3:625_1: kumudabhūmi, sogandhikabhūmi, uppalabhūmi, puṇḍarīkabhūmi, padumabhūmīti vattabbo.
anya-e0201n3:625_2: Ettha ca yasmā pāḷibhāsāyaṁ dasasatasahassaṁ nāma sattamaṭṭhānaṁ natthi, cha ṭhānāni
anya-e0201n3:625_3: eva atthi, tasmā garū aṭṭhakathāsu saṁ. ni. 1.181 āgatanayena sattamaṭṭhānaṁ ullaṅghetvā
anya-e0201n3:625_4: chaṭṭhaṭṭhānato upari bhūmisaṅkantiṁ kathentā sataguṇitaṁ katvā kathenti, satasahassānaṁ
anya-e0201n3:625_5: sataṁ koṭi, koṭisatasahassānaṁ sataṁ pakoṭi iccādi.
anya-e0201n3:626_0: Tattha satasahassānaṁ sataṁ nāma dasasatasahassānaṁ dasakameva hoti, tasmā tathā
anya-e0201n3:626_1: kathentāpi bhūmīnaṁ sabbaṭṭhānānañca dasaguṇasiddhimeva kathentīti veditabbaṁ. Yasmā
anya-e0201n3:626_2: ca gaṇanabhūmisaṅkhāto gaṇanapatho nāma nānādesavāsīnaṁ vasena nānāvidho hoti, tasmā
anya-e0201n3:626_3: dīpavaṁse akkhobhiṇī, bindu, kathāna, mahākathānāni vajjetvā pāḷinayena sattarasa
anya-e0201n3:626_4: bhūmiyova vuttā. Kaccāyane ka. 394, 395; rū. 416, 417 pubbe dassitā ekavīsati bhūmiyo,
anya-e0201n3:626_5: sakkataganthesu tato sādhikabhūmiyo, katthaci pana mahābalakkhandhapariyantā saṭṭhi bhūmiyoti āgatā.
anya-e0201n3:627: Tattha sakasakabhūmito atirekavatthūni gaṇanapathavītivattāni nāma honti, yesaṁ pana mūlabhūmimattaṁ atthi, tesaṁ koṭimattānipi vatthūni gaṇanapathātikkantāni eva.
anya-e0201n3:628_1: ca atthato ekaṁ. Tasmā idhapi vīsati bhūmiyo eva anukkamena dasaguṇitā gaṇanapathā
anya-e0201n3:628_2: nāma honti. Asaṅkhyeyyanti pana dasaguṇavinimuttā gaṇanapathātikkantabhūmi eva vuccati.
anya-e0201n3:628_3: Mahākathānabhūmātikkantato paṭṭhāya hi anantamahāpathaviyā sabbapaṁsucuṇṇānipi idha
anya-e0201n3:628_4: asaṅkhyeyyabhūmiyaṁ saṅgayhanti. Itarathā asaṅkhyeyyanti ca gaṇanapathabhūmīti ca viruddhametanti.
anya-e0201n3:629_0: Dīpavaṁse ca “tato upari abhūmi, asaṅkhyeyyanti vuccatī”ti vuttaṁ. Tattha ‘abhūmī’ti
anya-e0201n3:629_1: vacanena gaṇanapathabhūmi eva paṭisiddhā, na tu gaṇanapathātikkantā visuṁ asaṅkhyeyyabhūmi
anya-e0201n3:629_2: nāma. Cariyāpiṭakasaṁvaṇṇanāyampi cariyā. aṭṭha. nidānakathā ayamattho vutto. Asaṅkhyeyyabhūmiyampi
anya-e0201n3:629_3: asaṅkhyeyyānaṁ cūḷa, mahādivasena anekappabhedo dakkhiṇavibhaṅgasuttena ma. ni. 3.370 dīpetabbo.
anya-e0201n3:630_0: Saddanītiyaṁ nī. 833 pana pāḷinayaṁ gahetvā “vīsati abbudāni ekaṁ nirabbudaṁ nāma.
anya-e0201n3:630_1: Vīsati nirabbudāni ekaṁ ababaṁ nāma” iccādinā nirabbudādīnaṁ saṅkhyānampi vīsatimattaguṇaṁ
anya-e0201n3:630_2: nāma vuttaṁ. Taṁ na yujjati. Nirayesu hi vīsatimattaguṇena abbuda, nirabbudādīnaṁ
anya-e0201n3:630_3: dasannaṁ nirayānaṁ tāni nāmāni siddhāni bhavanti. Garū pana tāni nāmāni gahetvā dasaguṇasiddhesu
anya-e0201n3:630_4: gaṇanapathesu pakkhipiṁsu, tasmā nāmamattena sadisāni bhavanti, guṇavidhi pana visadisoeva.
anya-e0201n3:631_0: Evañcakatvā pāḷiyampi bakabrahmāsutte saṁ. ni. 1.175 “sataṁ sahassānaṁ nirabbudānaṁ,
anya-e0201n3:631_1: āyuṁ pajānāmi tavāhaṁ brahme”ti vuttaṁ. Ettha ca yadi gaṇanabhūmipathepi nirabbudānaṁ
anya-e0201n3:631_2: vīsatimattena abababhūmi bhaveyya, evaṁ sati nirabbudānaṁ satasahassaṁ nāma na vucceyya.
anya-e0201n3:631_3: Jātakaṭṭhakathāyañca jā. aṭṭha. 3.7.69 “nirabbudasatasahassānaṁ ekaṁ ahahaṁ nāma,
anya-e0201n3:631_4: ettakaṁ bakassa brahmuno tasmiṁbhave avasiṭṭhaṁ āyū”ti vuttaṁ. Tasmā imaṁ gaṇanabhūmipathaṁ
anya-e0201n3:631_5: patvā vīsatiguṇaṁ nāma natthīti siddhaṁ hoti. Akkhobhiṇī, bindu, kathāna, mahākathānānipi
anya-e0201n3:631_6: aññato gahetvā pakkhittāni siyuṁ. Evaṁ pakkhittānañca cuddasannaṁ saṅkhyānaṁ kaccāyane
